game.name: Cake Shop Bakery
game.description:
Does an online cooking game make you smile for hours? Are you among those parents who want to help your child learn the basic activities of the kitchen area? If yes, checking out this brand new online game can help get the answers to many queries related to the kitchen recipes. Here in Cake Shop: Bakery, you will be given a wonderful opportunity to run your own cake bakery shop. Trying it out is going to be a highly adventurous journey for you since you will be able to make and decorate scrumptious strawberry, chocolate or vanilla cakes for your customers while traveling around the world.

Make all your customers happy and get ready to head your truck to the next location to fill the kingdom with candy and desserts! It will be highly exciting to control and manage a popular baker who looks happy on the driving seat and reaches more and more customers in this magical free online cooking game. He has a faith on your ultimate food skills, so donâ€™t make him feel down. Do your best and prepare some delicious cakes for his customers. Keep collecting useful daily bonuses along the way in this cool HTML5 game!

It can be a wonderful game for little kids where they learn how to cook delicious cakes, while also visiting several wonderful locations around the world. With 60 levels, difficulties and challenges will increase in each level. Your winning performance will depend on serving your customers with the best quality cookies, chocolates and cakes. Be attentive since every customer has its own unique needs in this one of the best dessert games for girls. Try to make everyone feel content, so that your establishment will become popular worldwide!
